text: Læa xallxhˌ thrng yk xuthahrn kæ brrda phu sraththa thung phriya khxng khxng fir xea nˌ meux nang di klaw wa kha tæ phracea khxng kha phraxngkh khx phraxngkh thrng pord srang ban hlang hnung hı kæ kha phraxngkh n thi phraxngkh than nı swn swrrkh læa thrng pord chwy kha phraxngkh hı phn cak fir xea nˌ læa kark ra tha khxng khea læa thrng pord chwy kha phraxngkh hı phn cak hmu chn phu xthrrm
